title: Kotlin
text:
Kotlin

The kotlinc commandlet allows to install and setup Kotlin. The arguments (devon kotlinc «args») are explained by the following table:








Argument(s)
Meaning




setup
setup Kotlin (install or update and verify),  via KOTLIN_VERSION (use devon kotlinc version list to get available versions or devon kotlinc version set [TAB] to set version with auto-completion)


«args»
run Kotlin with the given «args»
